data.title: About APBY Conference
data.content: The APBY Conference is a gathering of Baptist youth in the Asia Pacific region that happens every 4 years. Under the Asia Pacific Baptist Federation, the conference includes youth of Baptist congregations from over 20 countries, uniting them in Christ and the global church.

data.title: About iDISCIPLE Philippines
data.content: iDISCIPLE Philippines is a ministry that exists to bring glory to God by making gospel-centered disciples of all nations, starting with the local churches in the Philippines. We do this through conferences and training courses for the youth, young adults, pastors, and ministry workers.
